meaningMnemonic: To <kanji>display</kanji> your writing so it's <kanji>put on</kanji> public record, it needs to go into <vocabulary>publication</vocabulary>. You're getting it <vocabulary>print</vocabulary>ed in a magazine, newspaper, etc., and this can refer to Internet publications as well.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
